definitions.definition: A mark made or tag attached to the ear of an animal (chiefly a livestock animal), generally to identify or indicate something about the animal, such as ownership , health or gestation status, etc.

subdefinitions.definition: A distinguishing or identifying mark or sign ; specifically ( archaic ) , a mark of ownership.

An act of designating certain funds to be used for a specific purpose ; specifically ( US , politics ) , a designation by the Congress that certain federal funds be appropriated for a specific project .

main_definition: ( chiefly agriculture ) A mark made or tag attached to the ear of an animal (chiefly a livestock animal), generally to identify or indicate something about the animal, such as ownership , health or gestation status, etc.
